permissions.name: commercial-use
permissions.label: Commercial use
permissions.description: This license allows the software or data to be used for commercial purposes.

permissions.name: modifications
permissions.label: Modification
permissions.description: This license allows the software or content to be modified.

permissions.name: distribution
permissions.label: Distribution
permissions.description: This license allows the software or content to be redistributed.

permissions.name: private-use
permissions.label: Private use
permissions.description: This license allows private use and modification.

permissions.name: patent-use
permissions.label: Patent use
permissions.description: This license includes an express grant of patent rights from contributors.

permissions.name: data-use
permissions.label: Data use
permissions.description: This license allows unrestricted use and reuse of data.

permissions.name: text-and-data-mining
permissions.label: Text and data mining
permissions.description: This license explicitly permits automated analysis such as machine learning and data mining.

permissions.name: create-adaptations
permissions.label: Create adaptations
permissions.description: This license allows derivative works or adaptations to be created.

conditions.name: include-copyright
conditions.label: Include copyright
conditions.description: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included.

conditions.name: include-copyright--source
conditions.label: Include copyright (source only)
conditions.description: A copyright notice must be included only in the source form.

conditions.name: document-changes
conditions.label: Document changes
conditions.description: Changes made must be clearly documented.

conditions.name: disclose-source
conditions.label: Disclose source
conditions.description: Source code must be made available when the software is distributed.

conditions.name: network-use-disclose
conditions.label: Network use disclosure
conditions.description: Source must be disclosed when users interact with the software over a network.

conditions.name: same-license
conditions.label: Same license
conditions.description: Modifications must be released under the same or a compatible license.

conditions.name: same-license--file
conditions.label: Same license (file)
conditions.description: Modified files must retain the original license.

conditions.name: same-license--library
conditions.label: Same license (library)
conditions.description: Modifications to libraries must retain the original license, with some exceptions for linking.

conditions.name: attribution
conditions.label: Attribution
conditions.description: Users must give appropriate credit to the original authors.

conditions.name: mark-changes
conditions.label: Mark changes
conditions.description: Users must indicate if changes were made.

conditions.name: share-alike
conditions.label: Share-alike
conditions.description: Derivative works must be distributed under the same or a compatible license.

conditions.name: non-endorsement
conditions.label: Non-endorsement
conditions.description: The license prohibits implying endorsement by the original authors.

conditions.name: license-linking
conditions.label: License linking
conditions.description: The license must be referenced or linked clearly in any reuse.

limitations.name: trademark-use
limitations.label: Trademark use
limitations.description: The license does not grant rights to use trademarks.

limitations.name: liability
limitations.label: Liability disclaimer
limitations.description: The license includes a limitation of liability.

limitations.name: warranty
limitations.label: No warranty
limitations.description: The license explicitly states that no warranty is provided.

limitations.name: no-personal-data-guarantee
limitations.label: No personal data guarantee
limitations.description: The license disclaims the presence or legality of personal data in the content.

limitations.name: database-rights-disclaimed
limitations.label: Database rights disclaimed
limitations.description: The license explicitly waives or disclaims sui generis database rights.
